title: Kled music sheet

embed.description: Uploaded by League of Legends on 2016-09-06.

replies.body: You could totally replace the (banjo?) with a saxaphone to give it a cool mellow...kind of like an underlying power feel...and the horn part in this piece sounds pretty awesome as well! Please Rito...I want this music

Hey there!

We're still trying to find a way to properly distribute sheet music to our players. I'm really sorry it's taking us so long to figure it out!

Cheers,
Ed the Conqueror

Just want to mention there is a market for League lute tablature. :P
(it's me. i am the market)
I was actually going to arrange some that music, but i'm too much of a procrastinator and i only have like the first 3 measures written on some notebook paper {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
